alert.note: Alert for Dinwiddie; Greensville; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:28PM EDT until June 17 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL GREENSVILLE...CENTRAL SUSSEX AND SOUTHEASTERN DINWIDDIE COUNTIES... At 527 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dewitt, or near McKenney, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Jarratt and Stony Creek around 550 PM EDT. Sussex around 600 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Owens, Gray, Mason, Cherry Hill, Booker, Yale, Lumberton, Wharfs Store, Huske and Littleton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
